org.apache.karaf.scr.management

Interface ServiceComponentRuntimeMBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceComponentRuntimeMBeanImpl

    public interface ServiceComponentRuntimeMBean
    The management interface for SCR Components.

      • isComponentEnabled

        boolean isComponentEnabled(long bundleId,
                           java.lang.String componentName)
        Check if the named component is currently enabled.
        Parameters:
        componentName - The component name.
        Returns:
        True if the component is ACTIVE, otherwise false.
